version_description:
Region 22: ENTRENCHED
A sleepy village. A pastoral field grown over the remnants of an early twentieth-century battlefield. Terrorism. The Pact - the deadly terrorist coalition that besieged an entire city not so long ago – has set up shop on this historic site, and are preparing to strike at nearby urban centers with weapons of mass destruction. They forgot that YOU are a weapon of mass destruction. It’s time to remind them - in fifty new Primary missions, endlessly competitive Assault missions, and intense Battle Hardened missions! Slug through historic trenches in all new Breach missions! When you have liberated the region, finish off the Pact leadership in our latest Black Ops missions! Generations past fought against tyranny on these grounds; they might tell you that back in their day they didn’t have any of your high-tech weaponry. So gear up and ship out – the battle for freedom continues!

UPCOMING EVENT: CINCO DE MAYO
* Celebrate Cinco de Mayo with four new Cinco de Mayo-themed weapons, like the HH Welcome Mat.
* Earn points towards unlocking exclusive Cinco de Mayo-themed gear in Campaign and Event missions.

TAKE YOUR GEAR FURTHER
* Keep on the lookout for new gear sets introduced in 2.9 and beyond with combat stats.
* Get duplicates of these gear to increase their combat strength.

PERKS POWERED UP
* Power up your Perks to further increase your combat effectiveness.

REGION 23: WHITE NOISE
Deep in the wilderness, at a bleeding edge observatory, a team of astronomers studies the stars in peace – a peace which is shattered by the unexpected arrival of NOVA! Still stinging from their defeat on the moon, NOVA has taken the scientists hostage and publicly declared their impossible ransom demands: a fleet of space shuttles. It falls to you once again, soldier, to take down these terrorists, rescue our greatest minds, and put an end to NOVA’s insane schemes! For science!

HOLIDAY CRATE UPDATE
Douse your opponents with weapons fire with the introduction of 4 water guns-themed weapons, like the HH Eyedropper

Region 24: RIP Tide
Welcome to fabulous Nautic World, the first premiere under-sea resort destination! Fine dining, luxury suites and exquisite views of the ocean depths. Nothing could possibly go wrong here. Nothing except terrorism! Black Eclipse returns, ruining the fun of under-sea elites, and it’s up to you to send them swimming for cover in 50 Primary Missions. Descend into the depths of endlessly replayable Assault missions. Unleash a slug shot tsunami in brand new Breach missions. Send Black Eclipse’s leadership on a one-way trip to the bottom of the ocean in a new round of Black Ops. When you’ve done all that, journey into the high-pressure depths of Battle Hardened mode to push your skills to the limit. Your new loadout includes the Brogan Palantir semi-automatic sniper rifle, the Quinn Rampage burst fire assault rifle and the mighty Caraway Leadstorm machine gun! With all that firepower, not even the most vicious beasts of the sea can stand against you – and certainly not some scurvy terrorists. So, dive into the action with Kill Shot Bravo’s newest region, RIP Tide!

Coming Soon:

MORE ZOMBIES
* The zombie apocalypse is nigh. Take out the zombie horde with 4 brand new zombie weapons, like the HH Romero machine gun
* 16 brand new Zombie Global Ops and Bounty missions

Holiday Event: 4th of July
* Earn points towards unlocking exclusive 4th of July-themed gear in Campaign and Event missions.
* Celebrate the 4th of July with the introduction of 4 fire rocket-themed weapons, like the HH Bottle Rocket

Introducing: Special Forces Missions
* Dominate the competition through a map of our best missions with an all new skill-based scoring system. Special Forces is a timed event where you compete in a series of challenges against our best players and alliances for top rewards.

Introducing: Daily Ops
* Complete Daily Objectives every day for rewards

Weapon and Gear Collections
* Collecting sets of Weapons and Gear will boost your War Rating and give out other rewards

Region 25: Valley of Death

We thought the notorious Los Colmillos Cartel was defeated and disbanded. We thought wrong. In a remote valley, the Los Colmillos have been busy taking over a gold mine and enslaving a nearby village. The people now toil in squalor, lorded over by gangsters with solid gold guns living in excess. With this nearly endless source of wealth, the Los Colmillos stand ready to rebuild their forces with the latest military technology and the most heartless mercenaries. Not on your watch! Liberate the people in fifty new Primary missions, then clean out the Los Colmillos leadership in five heart pounding new Black Ops! Grab your shotgun and take a ride into the gold mine in fifteen new Breach missions. Battle for the highest score in endlessly re-playable Assault Missions! If you survive all that, can you top the Battle Hardened leaderboard? All these missions call for some serious firepower, like the Brogan Pickpocket Sniper Rifle, the Quinn Tortoise Shell Assault Rifle! Armed to the teeth, you’ll brave the blistering heat of the jungle and the chill, glittering depth of the gold mines to bring freedom to the oppressed and justice to the oppressors in the latest Kill Shot Bravo region, Valley of Death!

Region 26: Full Metal Vacation II

Soldier, you’ve been hard at work for quite some time. Even one-person-armies need a break. It’s time for your vacation. Last time, your vacation was interrupted by terror But this time we’ve sent you off to an all-expense paid luxury island resort. See some shows. Do some gambling. There is no chance that we’ve sent you to TERRORCON, the world’s largest terrorist convention. That’s crazy! Why would you think that? That can’t even be a real thing, can it?

But, just to be safe, pack a bag full of weapons in case you need to fight your way through fifty new Primary Missions. ANNIHILATION IS COMING
They were created to make you obsolete – now they’ll be your toughest job yet.

The Annihilator series artificial soldier was created to protect us from our enemies. With an arsenal of the latest weaponry, a second-generation Aegis shield generator, and – most importantly – a neural network trained on the combat data of the most elite soldiers, the Annihilator series was ready to stop terror in its tracks – and put you out of a job.

NOVA, the world’s most technologically sophisticated terrorists, had other plans. Utilizing elite hacking skills, NOVA have sent the Annihilators rampaging through the city. It looks like plain old flesh and blood soldiering will be needed to save the day – so rally your Alliance, grab your anti-Aegis guns, and hunt down some rogue robots in Kill Shot Bravo’s newest Bounty event: Aegis Annihilation!

Play the missions critics are calling “heart warming”, “uplifting”, and “completely insane” in the Region 27 of Kill Shot Bravo: Lights! Camera! Action!

ANNIHILATION IS COMING
They were created to make you obsolete – now they’ll be your toughest job yet.

The Annihilator series artificial soldier was created to protect us from our enemies. With an arsenal of the latest weaponry, a second-generation Aegis shield generator, and – most importantly – a neural network trained on the combat data of the most elite soldiers, the Annihilator series was ready to stop terror in its tracks – and put you out of a job.

NOVA, the world’s most technologically sophisticated terrorists, had other plans. Utilizing elite hacking skills, NOVA have sent the Annihilators rampaging through the city. It looks like plain old flesh and blood soldiering will be needed to save the day – so rally your Alliance, grab your anti-Aegis guns, and hunt down some rogue robots in Kill Shot Bravo’s newest Bounty event: Aegis Annihilation!

Region 27: Lights! Camera! Action!
They were just trying to make movies. Now, the crew, staff and actors currently working on the latest summer block-busters are starring in their own personal thriller! NOVA has taken over the world’s premiere movie studio, making hostages of everyone on set. You have been sent in to do some rewrites of this terrorist plot.

Go on a whirlwind tour of the studio grounds and experience the magic of fifty new Primary missions. Face some “reel” challenges in all new Battle Hardened content. You’ll laugh, you’ll cry – you’ll dispense explosive justice in fifteen new Breach missions, and endlessly replayable Assault missions. Finally, send the leadership of NOVA to the cutting room floor in five action packed Black Ops missions.

Region 28: Warfair
With the recent destruction of Terrorcon, the world’s largest terrorist convention, our enemies have been forced to convene in far less luxurious surroundings – like the pier-side Warfair festival. It is unclear if they are gathered for some specific nefarious purpose, or just to play some carnival games. Either way: time for you to execute a pre-emptive strike against terror, wherever it rears its ugly head.

Step right up, soldier, and take aim in fifty new Primary missions, and endlessly replayable Assault missions! Take down enemy leaders in five Black Ops missions, and blast your way through fun houses and park attractions in fifteen new Breach missions. If you haven’t overloaded on fun yet, try your hand at the insanity of five brand new Battle Hardened missions!

Everyone’s a winner in the newest Kill Shot Bravo region: Warfair!

Region 29: Cold War
The Anubis organization’s Arctic sub base was destroyed long ago, however intel reports that Anubis agents escaped and have been holed up in a nearby, sleepy, fishing village on the coast. Their agenda in the past included heinous experiments on civilian populations – we cannot allow this to continue.

Melt your opposition in a whole new series of missions, including fifty new Primary missions, fifteen Breaches and endlessly replayable Assaults. Roast the new leaders of Anubis in five bone chilling Black Ops. If you haven’t succumbed to hypothermia yet, venture into the frozen depths of Battle Hardened for five new missions to test your limits.

Grab your mittens soldier, because it’s time to return to the north and turn up the heat in “Cold War”, Region 29 of Kill Shot Bravo!

Region 30: Raise the Roof

The usual terror groups have fallen silent. Perhaps they’ve learned their lesson? Power vacuums tend to bring out the worst though: The Initiative, a new group on the world terror stage, has laid siege to a nearby urban center. Your mission is to take to the rooftops and spoil their debut!

Engage in high-flying-roof-top-combat in fifty new Primary missions! Liberate beleaguered office workers in fifteen new Breach missions! Endlessly replay-able new Assault missions will let you test your wits and speed against other players. Show The Initiative higher ups who’s really boss in five new Black Ops missions. Finally, if you can stand the vertigo, ascend to the heights of difficulty in five new Battle Hardened missions.

Get to the chopper and into the action ASAP in Kill Shot Bravo Region 30: Raise the Roof!

REGION 31: BLOOD SHOT
On the frozen, distant surface of Mars, humanity has established a permanent outpost. A triumph of engineering and a testament to the human spirit – but also, apparently, a magnet for terror! NOVA returns, and with their seemingly unending well of funds they have staged a take-over of Mars Colony II! Get to Mars ASAP and reclaim the colony for freedom!

Rip through a whole new set of fifty Primary missions under the Martian sky, and tear your way through fifteen new Breach missions. Become the fastest gun in the solar system in new competitive Assault missions. Kick NOVA’s leadership into the cold void of space in five new Black Ops. Finally, engage in out-of-this-world difficult Battle Hardened missions!

We’ll see you at the party – the Mars party – in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest region, Blood Shot!

REGION 32: Siege Breaker
You’re en route to a remote village, scarcely touched by passage of centuries – the hidden headquarters of notorious terrorist collective, The Pact. Our intel shows they have been holed up here, plotting their attacks on urban centers. Time to turn the tables and lay siege!

Save historic landmarks – and shoot a whole lot of terrorists – in fifty stunning Primary missions. Catapult into the action in fifteen new Breach missions. Break the Pact once and for all in five new Black Ops missions. If you’re still standing after all that, become sniper royalty by besting five Battle Hardened missions that even medieval jailers would balk at.

Infiltrate and storm the gate in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest region, Siege Breaker!

REGION 34: UNDERWORLD
Anubis' desert base was only the tip of the iceberg: intel reports a fully operational base in a desolate alpine region. They’ve built into the mountain side to avoid satellite surveillance. Unfortunately for them, mountains are a pretty trivial obstacle for you.

Delve deep and flush out Anubis’ latest batch of fanatics in fifty new Primary missions! Hunt down their leaders in five new Black Ops missions! Let nothing – not mountains and certainly not doors – stand in your way as you blast through fifteen new Breach missions! Finally, descend into the depths and engage the most brutal Battle Hardened missions yet!

Gear up and get down in Kill Shot Bravo’s 34th Region: Underworld!

REGION 33: ROAD RAGE
You've been to some incredible places in your military career, but now it's time to get back to basics: the notorious Anubis organization has rebased in the midst of a war-torn desert nation. Left to their own devices they will resume their heinous human experiments. We will not leave them to their own devices, will we?

Engage in fierce, gritty combat in fifty all new Primary missions, and blast your way through the sprawling Anubis complex in fifteen Breach missions. After you’ve taken out the trash, finish up with five pulse pounding Black Ops missions. If you’re made it through all that, take on the world’s elite as you compete for leaderboard dominance in five face-melting Battle Hardened missions!

Put on fresh desert camo and clean your guns – because it’s about to get messy, in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest region: Road Rage!

You've been to some incredible places in your military career, but now it's time to get back to basics: the notorious Anubis organization has rebased in the midst of a war-torn desert nation. Left to their own devices they will resume their heinous human experiments. We will not leave them to their own devices, will we?

Engage in fierce, gritty combat in fifty all new Primary missions, and blast your way through the sprawling Anubis complex in fifteen Breach missions. After you’ve taken out the trash, finish up with five pulse pounding Black Ops missions. If you’re made it through all that, take on the world’s elite as you compete for leaderboard dominance in five face-melting Battle Hardened missions!

Put on fresh desert camo and clean your guns – because it’s about to get messy, in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest region: Road Rage!

REGION 34: UNDERWORLD
Anubis' desert base was only the tip of the iceberg: intel reports a fully operational base in a desolate alpine region. They’ve built into the mountain side to avoid satellite surveillance. Unfortunately for them, mountains are a pretty trivial obstacle for you.

Delve deep and flush out Anubis’ latest batch of fanatics in fifty new Primary missions! Hunt down their leaders in five new Black Ops missions! Let nothing – not mountains and certainly not doors – stand in your way as you blast through fifteen new Breach missions! Finally, descend into the depths and engage the most brutal Battle Hardened missions yet!

Gear up and get down in Kill Shot Bravo’s 34th Region: Underworld!

REGION 35: NEON NIGHTMARE
Our base in Neo Metro, the world’s most advanced metropolis, has been compromised! Traitors and thieves have infiltrated our facilities and absconded with billions in weapons and technology, killing many of our best agents. A terrorist faction calling themselves The New Oktaybr has claimed responsibility, and now chaos rules the neon stained streets of Neo Metro. Time for you to step in and deliver some vengeance!

Hunt down the enemy through fifty all new Primary missions in a dazzling downtown metropolis, then infiltrate the seedy underbelly of the city in fifteen pulse-pounding Breach missions! Compete against other players to see who can deliver the most justice in Assault mode. Solve the case of the base break-in and exact maximum punishment on the masterminds behind the attack in five new Black Ops missions – including a surprise visit from an old friend. Finally, if you survive all that, throw yourself into the craziest set of Battle Hardened missions ever for the ultimate challenge.

Gear up for vengeance. Lock and load for justice. This time it’s personal, in Kill Shot Bravo’s Region 35: Neon Nightmare!

REGION 36 BLACK OUT

Our decisive pummeling of the New Oktaybr faction in Neo Metro has sent shockwaves through the world of terrorism, and peace seems close at hand. But things are not always what they seem. Intel reports the remnants of several terrorist cells have banded together in a war-torn city, using the chaos as cover for their activities. Fortunately, we have the element of surprise. When night falls, we strike!

Under cover of darkness, infiltrate and annihilate the enemy in fifty new Primary missions! In five new Black Ops, you’ll have to tear down the new leadership of this rag tag band before they can attract more followers. Go head to head for the top score – and lots of cash - in Assault mode. Discover the terrible secret behind this gathering of villains in fifteen action packed Breach missions. When all that’s done, enter the darkest and most brutal Battle Hardened missions of all time.

Get your night camo on, power up your thermal and get ready for Kill Shot Bravo Region 36 – Black Out!

CLASSIC SNIPER DUEL PVP IS BACK!

Due to popular demand, we have decided to open up Classic Sniper Duel to all players! This mode was previously restricted to players who had created accounts before our new Sniper Duel mode was introduced, but now, all players will have access once they install the new Version 4.9 update.

Please note that this Classic Sniper Duel PvP mode does not contain the more recent updates and quality of life improvements that the current Sniper Duel mode offers. We hope you enjoy this look back at the roots of Kill Shot Bravo PvP!

Introducing, CRITICAL STRIKE, a new mode for players of all skill levels to earn exclusive free rewards!

Each monthly Critical Strike release will consist of a set of mission paths, each focusing on a specific weapon type. By completing missions, you earn bucks and milestone rewards (including Crate Tokens and Free Gold), only obtainable through each month’s Critical Strike release!

Plus, you can re-play ANY completed mission to improve your results, earn more bucks, and complete new challenges! Critical Strike missions and rewards will rotate every month, so get them while they’re hot!

Though you need a weapon from each category to complete all the paths, all you need to get into Critical Strike is a Sniper Rifle with the following minimum Region:

- Easy: Region 3 or higher
- Medium: Region 15 or higher
- Hard: Region 32 or higher
- Elite: Region 37 or higher
- Elite II: Complete all Black Ops missions in Elite
- Elite III: Complete all Black Ops missions in Elite II

[NOTE:] Entry requirements may change over time. [Elite] entry will require a Sniper Rifle from the latest Region.

We’ve designed Critical Strike to engage and reward players of all skill levels while creating challenging mission content for our most experienced players.

Critical Strike:
- Minor fixes and improvements
- New Event: Black Gold – Life has always been hard in this isolated tropical town, but it became terrifying when the Crimson Harvest arrived and commandeered the oil rigs, forcing the locals to work at gun point. These terrorist factions never seem to learn that those who live by the gun, die by the gun – your gun, in this case. A whole new set of Critical Strike missions awaits – Primary, Black Ops, and Battle Hardened Missions will put your sniper precision to the test. Go in guns blazing against overwhelming odds in Dual Wield, Assault, and Machine Gun missions. Finally, tear down the Crimson Harvest’s operation in fast-paced Breach action. This new-age terrorist group is overdue for an old-school beat down, and you’re just the one to deliver it to them, in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike Event: Black Gold!

Weapons and Bullets:
- New Pistol available in the Vanguard Crate!
- Milk Carton Bullet Skin 'Spilled Milk'!
- New Event Exclusive Weapons to compete for!

Events:
- Halloween in July holiday event coming soon! Participate to win a 'spooky' gear set!

PVP:
- Win the all new ARES gear set in PVP mode!

Event Crate:
- Event Crates now have multi-pull option, you can buy 1 Crate or 20 at once!

Critical Strike: Chill Shot

Heat waves rock the world, but you’ll be staying cool in Chill Shot, the latest Critical Strike event! Journey to a long abandoned super secret arctic base, now seized by a motley crew of terrorist scumbags. They have the men, the weapons and control over the missiles. Time to relieve them of all three.
Put the enemy on ice in an all new Sniper rifle track featuring Primaries, Black Ops and Battle Hardened missions to test your precision. Can you stay cool when the mayhem begins in a whole new suite of Machine Gun, Dual Pistol and Breach missions?

With multiple difficulties, repeatable missions and tons of loot to be had, Critical Strike: Chill Shot is exactly what you need to beat the heat!

NEW CRITICAL STRIKE THREE-STAR RATING SYSTEM

Think you’re a top shot? Test your mettle in our new Three-Star Rating System!
Take on optional objectives to unlock up to three Stars per mission! Stars unlock new Milestone Rewards, giving you more chances than ever to earn free power ups!

WEAPONS & GEAR
- New Region Guns!
- New Bullet Skin – the Dill Shot!

UPCOMING NEW WEAPONS & GEAR

Critical Strike: Throwing Shade

A thriving, peaceful metropolis held hostage by a militant terror cell? This sounds like a job for you - and a whole bunch of guns!

The Black Eclipse returns from obscurity with a vengeance, toting all the latest weapons of war. You’ve dealt with them in the past, but this time they’ll be ready. But for all their preparation, they didn’t count on the power of Shotguns! Shotgun Primaries, Shotgun Black Ops and even Shotgun Battle Hardened missions await! More Shotgun content than you can shake a boom-stick at!

While all this close range mayhem is sure to catch the Black Eclipse off guard, some situations call for keeping your distance – situations such as an all new set of Sniper, Machine Gun, and Dual Wield missions.

Grab your guns – all the guns – and take back the city in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event: Throwing Shade!

WEAPONS & BULLETS

* NEW LEGENDARY WEAPON! The HH Cerberus Shotgun!
* Death Metal Bullet Skin - turn up the audio!

OTHERS
* Global Ops Updates - introducing new competition tiers!

Critical Strike: Jungle Tango Foxtrot

In a corner of the world forsaken by the law, a heavily armed gang of bloodthirsty mercenaries has staged a hostile take over. The civilian population lives in constant fear. We cannot let this stand, obviously.

Your objective is simple: infiltrate the sweltering jungles, liberate the besieged citizens and send this cartel packing. But “simple” is not the same as “easy”: you’ll need to fight your way through Primaries, into Breaches, out of Black Ops and, between all that, mow down hordes of foes in Assault. Did we mention Machine Gun and Dual Wield missions? Well, we did now. After you’re done warming up on all that, it’s time for Battle Hardened missions – if you’re up to the task.

Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event is here so strap yourself in. You deploy at “right-now-o’clock”!

WEAPONS & GEAR
- New Region Guns
- New Zombie Weapons!

New Critical Strike Event: Operation Ragnarok

Unlikely as it seems, this Northern fishing village is the site of another conflict. While the snows have thawed, our enemies remain cold as ice and will stop at nothing to further their schemes. An enemy armada is anchored off the coast, and their forces have plundered the village’s supplies. Guess who’s got to bring down the hammer of justice? Spoiler alert: it’s you!

Ready for a brand-new challenge? Enter Critical Strike: Stealth Ops and put your stealth skills to the test. Can you take down all opposition without setting off the alarm?

Roll into a whole new set of Primary missions, and rock the enemy leaders in new Black Ops missions. Is that the sound of the world ending, or is it just the boom of a shotgun blasting through all new Breach missions? You’ll feel like the last human alive after you clear out the latest set of Battle Hardened missions!

It’s not the apocalypse, it’s just Operation Ragnarok – Kill Shot Bravo’s latest update!

WEAPONS & GEAR
- New Region Guns!
- New Bullet Skin - Ichabod Pain

New Stealth Ops Missions for Critical Strike

In Stealth Ops, you're tasked with silently eliminating your enemies using a silenced Sniper Rifle. Take them out without raising the alarm, and you win! If the opposing force becomes alerted to your presence, you'll need to try again, as stealth is the only solution in these challenging new missions. Eliminate targets with precision, paying attention to their positions, to master these new scenarios.

CRITICAL STRIKE: UNDER DESTRUCTION

The city is once again under siege as Marshall Squad returns to the scene of the crime. Their plan of attack seems familiar somehow, like they didn’t learn their lesson the last time. A construction site and surrounding structures are infested with terror. Time to hit the streets and send them back where they came from.

Engage in urban warfare from the streets, to construction sites, to the rooftops of the city. Take down the Marshall Squad’s forces in Primary missions, and dismantle their heavy armor in Black Ops. Action packed Dual Wield, Machine Gun and Breach missions round out this trip to the city. And, of course, diabolical Battle Hardened missions await at the far end of the track, if you’re feeling lucky.

Return to the the means streets of the city in Kill Shot Bravo’s Latest Critical Strike: Under Destruction!


WEAPONS & GEAR
- New Region Guns!
- New Holiday Bullet Skin - Stay Frosty!


NEW HOLIDAY THEMED EVENTS
Take out zombie enemies in all new Global Ops and Bounty missions!

OTHER CHANGES
- Filter out Alliance chat notifications in the Options menu.

Return to the the means streets of the city in Kill Shot Bravo’s Latest Critical Strike: Under Destruction!

Critical Strike: Jungle Tango Foxtrot

In a corner of the world forsaken by the law, a heavily armed gang of bloodthirsty mercenaries has staged a hostile take over. The civilian population lives in constant fear. We cannot let this stand, obviously.

Your objective is simple: infiltrate the sweltering jungles, liberate the besieged citizens and send this cartel packing. But “simple” is not the same as “easy”: you’ll need to fight your way through Primaries, into Breaches, out of Black Ops and, between all that, mow down hordes of foes in Assault. Did we mention Machine Gun and Dual Wield missions? Well, we did now. After you’re done warming up on all that, it’s time for Battle Hardened missions – if you’re up to the task.

Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event is here so strap yourself in. You deploy at “right-now-o’clock”!

WEAPONS & GEAR
- New Region Guns
- New Zombie Weapons!

Critical Strike: Chill Shot Bravo

Nefarious forces are gathering deep in the Northern Tundra, far from civilization. Our sources believe these forces are affiliated with the Anubis organization, renowned for their cruelty and use of biological weapons. We didn't think Anubis could possible survive the last time you defeated them. It appears we were wrong.
In this barren wasteland you will experience, for the first time ever, Assault Rifle Primary, Black Ops and Battle Hardened Missions. Break the ice with all new Breach, Dual Wield and Machine Gun Missions. Don’t worry snipers, we’ve still got Sniper Rifle Missions to satisfy your long-range needs. This could be the coolest Critical Strike yet!

Bundle up soldier! It’ll be a cold one, in the latest Critical Strike Event: Chill Shot Bravo!

WEAPONS & BULLETS

* New Legendary Pistol
* New Alliance War Event Reward Assault Rifle
* New Whiteout Event Boosted Weapons

OTHERS

* New Special Forces Missions!

Critical Strike: Space Race

NOVA, a terrorist organization renowned for technological sophistication and an obsession with outer space, have hatched simultaneous plots in some of our most vital – and remote – bases of operations. How remote? The Moon, Mars and in close orbit around the Sun. Remote enough for ya?

Strike a blow for science and throw NOVA off The Icarus, our solar observation base. Kick the moon dust off your boots and get ready to stomp terror on the surface of the Moon. Finally, comb the dunes of Mars and restore peace to the red planet. Dozens of missions spanning all weapon types – and millions of miles – await you!

This is going to be one hell of a trip, so strap yourself in and prepare for ignition as we blast off into Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event: Space Race!

WEAPONS & BULLETS

* New Whiteout Event Boosted Weapons
* New Event Reward Gear and Weapons
* New Gear in Gold Drop

OTHERS

* Refreshed Battle License!

Critical Strike: Rumble In The Rubble

A city disrupted by war. Two factions vying for dominance. A tyrannical regime set to seize control. One soldier sent to turn the tide in favour of freedom (that’s you).

Prowl the night and eliminate the enemy before they know what hit them in our brand-new Dual Pistol Stealth Ops! Take to the streets and rooftops of a war-torn city in the latest Primary missions. Get down to business in the smoke clogged alleyways of new Machine Gun missions. Dive into the front lines in all new Breach missions. If that wasn’t enough punishment, try your hand at an extra brutal series of Battle Hardened missions.

It’s grim. It’s dark. It’s Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike Event: Rumble In The Rubble!

WEAPONS & BULLETS

* New Aegis Event Boosted Weapons
* New Event Reward Gear and Weapons

OTHERS

* Refreshed Battle License!
* Back by popular demand, Prize Fights is now back and can be access through the PVP menu.

Critical Strike: Throwing Shade

A thriving, peaceful metropolis held hostage by a militant terror cell? This sounds like a job for you - and a whole bunch of guns!

The Black Eclipse returns from obscurity with a vengeance, toting all the latest weapons of war. You’ve dealt with them in the past, but this time they’ll be ready. But for all their preparation, they didn’t count on the power of Shotguns! Shotgun Primaries, Shotgun Black Ops and even Shotgun Battle Hardened missions await! More Shotgun content than you can shake a boom-stick at!

While all this close range mayhem is sure to catch the Black Eclipse off guard, some situations call for keeping your distance – situations such as an all new set of Sniper, Machine Gun, and Dual Wield missions.

Grab your guns – all the guns – and take back the city in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event: Throwing Shade!

WEAPONS & BULLETS

* NEW LEGENDARY WEAPON! The HH Cerberus Shotgun!
* Death Metal Bullet Skin - turn up the audio!

OTHERS
* Global Ops Updates - introducing new competition tiers!

Critical Strike: The Tide of Battle

Not even the seas are safe from the forces of evil! An entire stretch of ocean has been claimed by heavily-armed insurgents. A small island village, a nearby oil rig, and an under-sea luxury resort have been seized.

The time has come to turn the tide, so flush out the enemy in aquatic-themed Primary and Black Ops missions! The doors might be water-tight, but are they bullet proof? Grab your favourite Shotgun and find out in Breach mode! Unleash a tsunami of bullets in Machine Gun and Dual Wield missions! If you’re not ready to come up for air after all that, put your endurance to the test in Battle Hardened mode!

The enemy is here, and from the beaches, to the seas, to the depths, you will fight them – in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event, The Tide of Battle!

UPCOMING NEW WEAPONS & GEAR

* New Event-Boosted Zombie Weapons
* When Pigs Fly Bullet Skin
* New Gear in the Epic Stockpile
* New Whiteout Event-Boosted Gear

UPDATES TO GAME MODES

* Global Ops now has Alliance MVP Leaderboards

Critical Strike: The Tide of Battle

Not even the seas are safe from the forces of evil! An entire stretch of ocean has been claimed by heavily-armed insurgents. A small island village, a nearby oil rig, and an under-sea luxury resort have been seized.

The time has come to turn the tide, so flush out the enemy in aquatic-themed Primary and Black Ops missions! The doors might be water-tight, but are they bullet proof? Grab your favourite Shotgun and find out in Breach mode! Unleash a tsunami of bullets in Machine Gun and Dual Wield missions! If you’re not ready to come up for air after all that, put your endurance to the test in Battle Hardened mode!

The enemy is here, and from the beaches, to the seas, to the depths, you will fight them – in Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event, The Tide of Battle!

UPCOMING NEW WEAPONS & GEAR

* New Event-Boosted Zombie Weapons
* When Pigs Fly Bullet Skin
* New Gear in the Epic Stockpile

Critical Strike: Into The Pit

Abandoned, derelict, and baking in the blistering heat of a remote desert, this abandoned strip mine is hardly a tourist destination. No one told the motley crew of terrorists assembled here, though. Taking advantage of the remoteness of this location, the forces of evil are amassing weapons of war and stolen tech. It’s time to drop in and crash this party!

Shock, awe, and Sniper Rifles – get the drop on the enemy in all new Primary missions. Blast your way into the depths of the earth in all new Breach missions. Take a deep dive into the action in Dual Wield missions. New Machine Gun missions will take you for a bullet-riddled ride. Finally, when the dust settles, pit yourself against the latest Battle Hardened missions.

Gear up and get ready to drop Into The Pit, Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event!

Critical Strike: Sun's Out Guns Out

The sun is shining, the birds are chirping – the guns are blazing. The entertainment district is swarming with terrorists intent on bringing their own brand of sadistic summer fun to everyone, whether they want it or not. From the movie studio to the dockside fair, you’ve got your work cut out for you to make the place safe for regular non-terrorist tourists.

Step right up and take your best shot in Primary missions spanning a wide array of movie sets and carnival attractions. Everyone’s a winner when you Breach your way through interior sets and haunted houses. Two times the gun, two times the fun in Dual Wield missions! Yes, indeed we have something for everyone, even you Machine Gun fans! You may not win a stuffed animal for a loved one, but you will win eternal glory – in Battle Hardened mode!

UPCOMING NEW WEAPONS & GEAR
* New Event-Boosted Whiteout Weapons!
* 'Laces Out' Bullet Skin!
* New Alliance War Reward!

Critical Strike: Icarus Rising (Revisited)

It’s time to revisit the Critical Strike event that started it all – Icarus Rising! In case you missed it the first time around, Icarus Rising will pit you against the merciless forces of NOVA in the most extreme environment imaginable – aboard an advanced space station in orbit about the Sun!
Battle for the future of the sun in this classic Critical Strike event, brought back with all new 2-star and 3-star objectives!

Critical Strike: Get Medieval

Scenic castles make for lovely tourist destinations – and perfect lairs of terrorism! A pair of such castles has been invaded by the forces of tyranny. These villains cannot be left alone to enact their nefarious schemes. They must be stopped for the sake of freedom, justice, and the local tourist economy!

Visit several scenic castle locales, and drink in the rich history as you systematically dismantle entrenched terror cells in Primary missions. Try not to destroy too many priceless cultural artifacts as you engage in breakneck close quarters Breach action! Be at least somewhat mindful of centuries-old-architecture as you mow down hordes of enemies (and probably blow up a bunch of explosives) in Machine Gun and Dual Pistol missions!

Get geared up. Get ready. Get cultured. It’s time for Kill Shot Bravo’s latest Critical Strike event: Get Medieval.

UPCOMING NEW WEAPONS & GEAR
* Gear up for Aegis Event with the all new Star Dodger set!
* New Alliance Reward - Sewer Gator Shotgun!

Critical Strike: Greatest Hits!

KSB is turning 4! To celebrate, we're bringing back your favourite missions, as voted by you - the community! They'll be available to enjoy through the latest Critical Strike Event: Greatest Hits! Also be sure to check your inbox as well for a special gift as a token of our appreciation for supporting KSB throughout the years!

Upcoming Weapons & Gear:
* Aegis Event-Boosted Weapons
* Update to gold drop gear
* Free birthday bullet skin
* 'Kill-A-Copia' Thanksgiving themed bullet skin
